titles.title: To require the Securities and Exchange Commission to adjust certain resubmission thresholds for shareholder proposals.
To require the Securities and Exchange Commission to adjust certain resubmission thresholds for shareholder proposals.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported by the Yeas and Nays: 34 - 22.

action.text: Reported by the Committee on Financial Services. H. Rept. 115-904.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 700.
